name: Diable Jambe

trigger.text: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Blocker Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

text: Main: Select up to 1 of your {Straw Hat Crew} type Leader or Character cards. Your opponent cannot activate Blocker if that Leader or Character attacks during this turn.

effect.text: Choose up to 1 Straw Hat Crew Leader or Character. If that card attacks this turn, your opponent cannot activate Blocker during that battle.
K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Blocker Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
